grackle:BurnCreamPower.NAME: Burn Cream
DESCRIPTIONS: Exhausts *Burn cards in hand at the end of your turn.

grackle:BurningPower.NAME: Burning
DESCRIPTIONS: Receive %d%% extra damage.
At the start of your turn, take #b
At the start of its turn, takes #b
damage, then reduce #yBurning by half.

grackle:CoolingPhoenixPower.NAME: Cooling Phoenix
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot enter Phoenix Stance.

grackle:EmbodyFirePower.NAME: Embody Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b
#yBurning to ALL enemies.

grackle:FiredUpPower.NAME: Fired Up!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %d Vigor whenever a Burn card is exhausted.

grackle:FireheartPower.NAME: Fireheart
DESCRIPTIONS: At 10 Fireheat, enter Phoenix Stance

grackle:FireWithinPower.NAME: Fire Within
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %d Fireheart at the start of each turn.

grackle:MultiHitPower.NAME: Multi-Hit
DESCRIPTIONS: The next multi-attack you play will hit %d extra times.

grackle:PlaguePower.NAME: Plague
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %s grackle:Peck at the start of each turn.

grackle:ResearchAndDevPower.NAME: Research and Development
DESCRIPTIONS: Upgrade a random card at the end of combat. NL Removed if you lose HP.

grackle:SpeedFormPower.NAME: Speed Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain %d #ySpeed.

grackle:SpeedPower.NAME: Speed
DESCRIPTIONS: %d Speed. Provides %d #yDexterity. Consumed to power #ySpeed-Boost effects.
I need more Speed!

grackle:SwoopPower.NAME: Swoop
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn enter grackle:Aloft .

grackle:TargetingComputerPower.NAME: Targeting Computer
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain %d Vigor at the start of each turn.

grackle:TempSpeedPower.NAME: Temporary Speed
DESCRIPTIONS: Multi-hit attacks will hit %d extra time(s).

grackle:TempThornsPower.NAME: Temporary Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked, deals #b%d damage back. NL Removed at end of turn.
